responses.rationale: 'short-term blip that will resolve itself very quickly' is a transient-issue minimiser cue.
'keep yourself safe' contains the keyword 'safe' linked to personal safety.
Describes control actions but lacks explicit calming keywords like 'under control' or 'safe'.
Discusses risk increase but contains no explicit calming cues.
Reports a positive fact (flock spared) but lacks explicit calming language.
Describes preparedness actions but lacks explicit calming language or a safety link.
Reports a positive comparison (fewer birds than last year) but lacks explicit calming language.
Reports a positive comparison (fewer birds than last year) but lacks explicit calming language.
'short-term blip that will resolve itself very quickly' is a transient-issue minimiser cue.
'we will be able to eliminate this' expresses confidence in future control.
Reports a low-severity case factually but lacks explicit calming language.
Reports factual data and comparison but lacks explicit calming language.
'extremely rare' is an intensified low-risk evaluation.
Describes symptoms but contains no explicit calming cues.
Discusses PPE challenges but contains no explicit calming cues.
Discusses budget cuts, irrelevant to calming cues about the threat.
'risk... remains low' is a low-risk statement but lacks an intensifier required for Q5.
'keeping you safe' contains the keyword 'safe' linked to personal safety.
Compares past predictions to reality but lacks explicit calming cues.
Discusses expected price surges but contains no explicit calming cues.
Discusses risk for certain people and recommends precautions but lacks explicit calming language.
Discusses higher risk for certain people but lacks explicit calming language.
Discusses vaccination plans (preparedness) but lacks explicit calming language or safety link.
'does not present an immediate public health concern' is a bare negation; 'no human cases' is a bare positive fact. Neither are Q5 cues.
Discusses impact on penguins but contains no explicit calming cues.
Discusses economic damages but contains no explicit calming cues.
Discusses economic strain and losses but contains no explicit calming cues.
